info.name: Template Manager
info.description:
Easy manage your cloud themes, with live previews on the admin settings page. Especially useful after an (app) update. Translated to English, German, Spanish, French and Dutch.
Description: It reads directory names listed in the cloudroot/themes/ folder and it looks up every theme name, logo, slogan and location.
Please note, that this app is not updateable via the normal installer/updater!
